title: "AI is creating fake legal cases and making its way into real courtrooms, with disastrous results"
excerpt: "It’s well known that courts must decide disputes based on the law, which is presented by lawyers to the court as part of a client’s case. It’s therefore highly concerning that fake law, invented by AI, is being used in legal disputes."
